messages.message: Hi Team. I see that mounting Google Cloud Storage is beta on 23.01. Will this be GA anytime soon? We have a usecase in Colpal for which this could prove useful. Atm, we have suggested pulling data using the GCP client for Python from a UDF but if are able to mount a drive, it becomes much easier

Hi, yes we’re planning to GA it in the next major release 23.04. I would be great if you could start mounting the drive and using it even in beta. We’d appreciate any feedback or hear about any issues you run into. fyi @Cheryl Zhou @Xi Cheng
Hi Heymian. Thanks for the update. Sure we'll try it out. Will keep you posted on how it goes :+1::skin-tone-4:
